page.title: 04WAYS OF PASSING THE TIME
page.content:
{LEISURE ACTIVITIES}(2)
{RIDING: Some people in this area have their own ponies in fields near their homes or they may keep them at livery stables.Other go to riding stables for lessons.There is one in Lower Rainham. They have an indoor and an outdoor school and about 40 ponies and horses.
{READING: I enjoy reading.It is my favourite hobby.I usually read at night because it is more peaceful.My sister does not like me doing it because I have to open the curtains and it keeps her awake.
